About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Professional Summary

Meticulous Software Engineer, excellent at multi-tasking and working under pressure, while effectively prioritizing and delegating tasks for multiple projects. Broad industry experience includes IT Sales, Team, and Product Management, including Logistics. Knowledgeable and resourceful team member, able to work independently, in a fast-paced environment, while also collaborating with a software team to drive projects to a high level of completion.

Professional Experience


Compu Asset Management

Product Manager, IT Hardware

• Execute all aspects of IT Hardware product acquisition and redistribution, including hard drives, monitors, and laptops, with average unit volume handled exceeding 1 million products annually
• Build Sales relationships and establish new networks to connect business clients’ product life cycle needs with local and international vendors, achieving long term business growth
• Oversee logistics for technology product recovery, recycling and/or disposal achieving best possible ROI
• Manage inventory and coordinate shipping and receiving of assets ensuring accuracy and compliance
• Maintain productivity for a team of 4-8 employees through planning, scheduling and training as needed
• Streamline flow of communication by promptly responding to and resolving all client and vendor inquiries
